mysql.query: SELECT created_dt AS utc, service_id as service, count(*) AS value FROM news.news_campaign GROUP BY service, hour(created_dt) ORDER BY id LIMIT %s OFFSET %s

SELECT created_dt AS utc, service_id as service, campaign_id as campaign, message_type as type, status, count(*) AS value FROM news.news_message_sms GROUP BY service, campaign, type, status, hour(created_dt) ORDER BY id LIMIT %s OFFSET %s
SELECT created_dt AS utc, service_id as service, list_id as list, count(*) AS value FROM news.cds_contact GROUP BY service, list, hour(created_dt) ORDER BY id LIMIT %s OFFSET %s
SELECT created_dt AS utc, service_id as service, count(*) AS value FROM news.cds_list GROUP BY service, hour(created_dt) ORDER BY id LIMIT %s OFFSET %s
